title: Iranian Nobel Peace Laureate Starts New Hunger Strike in Prison
summary_full: The rights activist Narges Mohammadi is protesting her continued detention, her family said. She was arrested again in December after being given leave from prison for medical treatment.
summary_public: The rights activist Narges Mohammadi is protesting her continued detention, her family said. She was arrested again in December after being given leave from prison for medical treatment.

IR.label: negative
